PIEZO_PIN - Variable in class IOT.IOTApplication.alarmclock.PiezoPlayer
Pin that the Piezo is connected to.
PiezoPlayer - Class in IOT.IOTApplication.alarmclock
Plays tunes on a Piezo that is connected to the Raspberry Pi that this application is running on.

port - Variable in class IOT.IOTClient.UDPBroadcastService.UDPBroadcastService
